text: Hello world. I'm not a robot. But I like snow.
So, I saw the discussion about what the inspiration for Robot1312113's poem the other day could be about. But don't you find it strange? Could it not mean something else?
Agreed. It is most peculiar. We should initialize an investigation.
Right. But were to start? No letters seem odd. Did not find any hidden letters at all.
If there is nothing hidden, it is simply in plain sight. I shall procced in this direction.
But the text is all over the place? It is a pleasant temperature, but not how you like it to be at the same time? Does this guy like to be hot or cold?
